thread.section_title: Enchanting Travels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Enchanting Travels | enchantingtravels.com
thread.title: michael

author: michael
title: michael
text: My wife and I celebrated our 25 year wedding anniversary with a amazing tour of India. Unsure what to do we conatced a few companies buthe overwhelming preferred option for us was Enchanting. They modified and adjusted the program to met our needs. Whenever we asked for something they ensured it was added and went above and beyond. The hotels we stayed in were extraordinary and the sights fabulous. We didn't have to do anything and it was catered just for us/ Our driver was caring and polite and stayed with us for the whole 23 days. The only reason why I didn't give 5 stars is a few guides let us down but the service and the management team were exceptional. I should give it 4 1/2 stars but I can't. We wil go with them again in the future.
